columns:
id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    user_id UUID,
    agent_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    thread_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    session_context JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    expires_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT (now() + '24:00:00'::interval),
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    email TEXT NOT NULL,
    first_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    last_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    project_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    status TEXT DEFAULT 'pending'::text,
    responses JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    approved_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
    creator_profile_id UUID

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    user_id UUID,
    message TEXT NOT NULL,
    page VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    user_context JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()

id BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('claude_api_calls_id_seq'::regclass),
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    user_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    user_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    user_email TEXT,
    endpoint TEXT NOT NULL,
    model TEXT DEFAULT 'claude-3-sonnet-20240229'::text,
    input_tokens INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    output_tokens INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    total_tokens INTEGER,
    input_cost NUMERIC DEFAULT 0,
    output_cost NUMERIC DEFAULT 0,
    total_cost NUMERIC,
    response_time_ms INTEGER,
    success BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    error_message TEXT,
    cache_hit BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
    cached_tokens INTEGER DEFAULT 0

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    user_id UUID,
    message_text TEXT,
    role TEXT,
    context JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    metadata JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    user_id UUID,
    flow_step INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
    current_responses JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    flow_state JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    last_question_asked TEXT,
    completion_percentage NUMERIC DEFAULT 0.0,
    is_completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    archetype VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date_taken TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    archetype TEXT NOT NULL,
    test_responses JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    archetype_score INTEGER,
    secondary_archetype TEXT,
    secondary_score INTEGER,
    date_taken TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT now()

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    slack_id TEXT,
    slack_email TEXT,
    zoom_email TEXT,
    first_name TEXT,
    preferences JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    last_interaction_date TIMESTAMPTZ,
    interaction_count INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    last_name TEXT

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    user_id UUID,
    meeting_id TEXT,
    interaction_type TEXT,
    metrics JSONB DEFAULT '{"completion_rate": 0.0, "response_time_ms": 0, "context_relevance": 0.0}'::jsonb,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    user_id UUID,
    summary_date DATE,
    content TEXT,
    metadata JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    relevance_score DOUBLE PRECISION,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    meeting_id TEXT,
    user_id UUID,
    team_id BIGINT,
    video_url TEXT,
    duration_seconds INTEGER,
    file_size_bytes BIGINT,
    metadata JSONB DEFAULT '{"format": "mp4", "status": "available", "recording_type": "full"}'::jsonb,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()

zoom_meeting_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    team_id BIGINT,
    id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    user_id UUID,
    memory_type TEXT,
    content TEXT,
    relevance_score DOUBLE PRECISION,
    summary_date DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    metadata JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    user_id UUID,
    project_name TEXT,
    project_type TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    current_phase TEXT,
    goals ARRAY DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb[],
    challenges ARRAY DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb[],
    success_metrics JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    creation_date TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    last_updated TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    user_id UUID,
    flow_step INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
    current_data JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    flow_state JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    topic_progress JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    completion_percentage NUMERIC DEFAULT 0.0,
    is_completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    project_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    update_date DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    progress_summary TEXT,
    milestones_hit ARRAY,
    blockers ARRAY,
    next_steps ARRAY,
    mood_rating INTEGER,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    slack_workspace_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    slack_workspace_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    bot_user_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    bot_token TEXT NOT NULL,
    installing_slack_user_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    installing_user_email TEXT,
    user_id UUID,
    installed_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    token_expiration TIMESTAMPTZ,
    token_refreshed_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
    refresh_token TEXT

id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    team_name TEXT

team_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    creator_profile_id UUID NOT NULL

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    meeting_date TIMESTAMPTZ,
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    metadata JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    team_id BIGINT

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    meeting_id TEXT,
    metadata JSONB DEFAULT '{}'::jsonb,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    summary TEXT,
    team_id BIGINT

id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    user_id UUID,
    meeting_id TEXT,
    rating INTEGER,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_type TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()

id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('waitlist_id_seq'::regclass),
    email TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
